snippet: William Lewis, a longtime News Corporation insider, had been the Dow Jones division’s acting chief since Les Fenwick resigned in January.
abstract: William Lewis is named permanent chief of News Corporation's Dow Jones division, having served acting chief executive since January.
lead_paragraph: William Lewis, a longtime News Corporation insider, had been the Dow Jones division’s acting chief since Les Fenwick resigned in January.

headline.main: Dow Jones Acting Chief Is Given Job Permanently
headline.print_headline: Dow Jones Acting Chief Is Given Job Permanently
